body: {"initialMessage":"I believe serverless architecture offers better scalability and cost efficiency compared to traditional deployment models.","personas":{"initiator":{"id":"engineer","job_title":"Software Engineer","traits":["Analytical","Detail-oriented","Logic-driven","Technical perfectionist"],"communication_style":"Direct and data-driven","motivations":["Clean architecture","Efficiency","Learning new tech"],"frustrations":["Vague requirements","Unrealistic deadlines"],"values":["Technical quality","Precision","Clarity"]},"responder":{"id":"product_manager","job_title":"Product Manager","traits":["Strategic","Empathetic","Outcome-focused","Persuasive"],"communication_style":"Visionary and user-focused","motivations":["Customer value","Business impact","Fast delivery"],"frustrations":["Engineering delays","Overcomplicated solutions"],"values":["User satisfaction","Speed","Collaboration"]}}}
